title: Default values not shown in Show Report Parameters dialog
description: When previewing a report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the default values for the parameters are not displayed in the value box. This prevents me from easily modifying the parameters I want to change. Instead, all the values are empty in the Enter Parameters dialog, forcing me to input all values again.
OB: Create several report parameters and set default values for them. Drag them to the layout.
EB: When previewing the report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the default values for the parameters should be displayed in the value box. This will allow me to easily modify the parameters without having to input all values again.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create several report parameters and set default values for them. 2. Drag the parameters to the layout. Preview the report and click the Show Report Parameters button. Note that the default values are not shown in the value box.
